examples.example: 我知道只要努力就能取得好成绩。

translate.english: I know that as long as one works hard, one can achieve good results.

examples.example: 我知道只要保持乐观，生活就会充满阳光。

translate.english: I know that as long as I keep optimistic, life will be full of sunshine.

examples.example: 我知道只要坚持不懈地追求梦想，就一定能收获成功的喜悦。

translate.english: I know that as long as we persevere in pursuing the dream, we will definitely be able to reap the joy of success.
